Notifications.defaultErrorMessage: An error has occurred. Please try again later

Common.logInPrompt:
Already one of us? 
 If you've got an account, it's game time.
Common.signUpPrompt: Not a part of the family, yet?

email.notUnique:
Guess what? You're already one of us! 
Click the login button below to dive back in.

password.pattern: Minimum eight characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
password.minLength: Password must have at least {chars} characters

nickname.pattern: Oops, we only roll with A-Z and 0-9 here!
nickname.minLength: Your gamer tag needs at least {chars} characters to join the clash!
nickname.notUnique: That gamer tag is claimed! Try another one.

dateOfBirth.required: Please enter your date of birth
dateOfBirth.min: Platform is only eligible for users that are {year} years old and above
dateOfBirth.pattern: Please enter a valid date of birth

VerifyEmail.title: Check your inbox!
VerifyEmail.subtitle: We've fired off an email with a verification link. And hey, if you don't see it, take a peek in your spam folder.
VerifyEmail.resendPrompt: Still nothing? Click and we'll give it another shot.

VerifyEmailExpired.title: Link expired...
VerifyEmailExpired.subtitle: It seems link is expired, please start sign up process again

CreatePassword.title: Craft your access key
CreatePassword.subtitle: Your password should be strong and something only you know.

CreateNickname.title: Design your in-game name
CreateNickname.subtitle: You're crafting your identity in the world of VoteClash. What will you be known as?

nickname.label: Nickname
nickname.caption: Min 4 characters. You can use latin letters & numbers

errorMessages.invalidPreregistrationId: Oops! Seems like your registration id has expired. Please try again

validationMessages.root: Hmm, your login info is not matching up. Double-check and let's try again.

validationMessages.email:
No account linked to this email. 
Maybe a typo?

ResetPassword.title: Craft your access key
ResetPassword.subtitle: Your password should be strong and something only you know.

ResetPasswordSuccess.title: Perfect!
ResetPasswordSuccess.subtitle: Your password swap was successful. Time to log in with your new key and jump back into the action!

joinPrompt.streamer: Join the Elite: Upgrade Streaming Game with LegendsClub!
joinPrompt.viewer:
Join the Clash! 
Get in on the action 
and start predicting!

headingBanner.title: Elevate Your Stream Boost Viewer Engagement!

climbAboard.text:
Climb aboard the LegendsClub – VoteClash's distinguished affiliate program – and ride the wave to legendary status in the streaming universe. 

As part of the LegendsClub, you're not just affiliating; you're entering an empowered community of gaming enthusiasts and streamers committed to upping their game and amplifying their streams.

embarkBanner.title:
Embark on a legendary journey with 
the LegendsClub.
embarkBanner.subtitle: Together, let's redefine the streaming experience!

amplifiedEngagement.title: Amplified Engagement
amplifiedEngagement.text: Our unique voting system transforms your viewers from spectators to active participants. They'll predict, engage, and invest themselves in your streams, increasing viewer retention and community vibrancy.

boostedVisibility.title: Boosted Visibility
boostedVisibility.text: As a member of the LegendsClub, your streams gain exposure on our platform, attracting more traffic and potential fans your way. More viewers translate into more votes, greater interaction, and amplified fun!

premiumMonetization.title: Premium Monetization
premiumMonetization.text: It's not just about drawing an audience, but about capitalizing on your content. Our pot system allows you to reap a percentage of the profits, paving the way for a potent revenue stream.

exclusiveInvites.title: Exclusive Invites
exclusiveInvites.text: Get invited to exclusive tournaments and special events, giving you an edge over other streamers and increasing your exposure. Plus, with early access to new features, you'll always be at the forefront of innovation.

howItWork.title: How does it work?
howItWork.subtitle: Whether you're a professional streamer or a beginner in the streaming arena, VoteClash will help you enhance viewer engagement and make their experience exciting.

steps.title: Partner Up
steps.text: VoteClash allows streamers to become partners through their affiliate program called LegendsClub.

steps.title: Boost Viewer Engagement
steps.text: VoteClash takes viewer engagement to the next level with its voting system, allowing viewers to be fully involved by voting for their preferred outcomes, creating an immersive streaming experience.

steps.title: Earn Rewards
steps.text: By being part of the VoteClash platform, streamers have the opportunity to earn rewards. The more active the viewers are, the higher the potential for streamers to earn rewards.

engage.text: The thrill-packed game within a game that's reshaping the way fans engage with their favorite streamers. Born out of a passion for gaming, we're here to amplify the excitement of every livestream and put you in the thick of the action.

partOfGame.text: At VoteClash, we don't just sit on the sidelines – we're part of the game. Our platform allows fans to predict gameplay outcomes, contributing to the narrative of each stream. With us, viewers get more than just a front-row seat – they become part of the adventure.

boost.text: We believe in giving streamers the boost they need. Our platform drives traffic and enhances viewer engagement, keeping audiences hooked for longer. But we're not just about the numbers – we're here to build a vibrant community where streamers and fans can connect on a deeper level.

discover.title: Discover Your Arena
discover.subtitle: From fast-paced Battle Royale to tactical strategies, we've got a variety of games ready for your predictions.
